article: residents of the italian island of stromboli , who had to be evacuated for several weeks early this year due to a volcanic eruption , got a new scare early on saturday when a mountaintop eruption sent rocks cascading down onto several houses , officials said .
abstract: italy 's stromboli volcano shows new sign of life
